laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

Non-obstructive bowel gas pattern with air-filled ascending, transverse and descending colon with no evidence of dilatation. A biliary stent remains unchanged in position compared to previous radiograph. No pneumatosis or free air.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Biliary stent remains unchanged in position compared to previous radiograph.
